医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
英国饮食调查研究调查将超加工食品纳入饮食指南加工食品是否遵循所有饮食建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/UK-diet-survey-study-investigates-inclusion-of-ultra-processed-foods-in-dietary-guidelines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/UK-diet-survey-study-investigates-inclusion-of-ultra-processed-foods-in-dietary-guidelines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a7e0c20-bff1-4584-a01a-80cf2cd45341 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 04:58:00 -0500 UK diet survey study investigates inclusion of ultra-processed foods in dietary guidelines
气味和语言线索在回忆中的作用气味与单词线索是否可以促进特定 AM 回忆缺陷的 MDD 患者的记忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/The-role-of-odor-and-verbal-cues-in-recalling-memories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/The-role-of-odor-and-verbal-cues-in-recalling-memories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8eb2ef8c-9471-4cfb-be82-96b83c58e056 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 04:24:00 -0500 The role of odor and verbal cues in recalling memories
普渡大学报告发现，新年决心更加健康饮食根据 1 月份消费者食品洞察报告，与去年相比，进入 2024 年，与食品或营养相关的新年决心更受消费者欢迎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Increasing-New-Years-resolutions-for-healthier-eating-Purdue-report-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Increasing-New-Years-resolutions-for-healthier-eating-Purdue-report-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb2c5f7b-99a6-4ad6-8156-eb1de22a457a Thu, 15 Feb 2024 23:52:02 -0500 Increasing New Year's resolutions for healthier eating, Purdue report finds
了解 COVID-19 对上海和香港的不同影响：比较分析宣布在 Zoonoses 杂志上发表新文章。 2022 年初，中国上海和香港爆发了 COVID-19。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Understanding-the-varied-impact-of-COVID-19-in-Shanghai-and-Hong-Kong-A-comparative-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Understanding-the-varied-impact-of-COVID-19-in-Shanghai-and-Hong-Kong-A-comparative-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69784ca3-f8cf-42cb-bb6c-d708f1f05e76 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 23:29:55 -0500
下一代测序和机器学习用于绘制胰腺癌的遗传图谱2024 年 2 月 5 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“胰腺腺癌队列中的遗传和治疗景观：用于完整肿瘤外显子组分析的下一代测序和机器学习”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Next- Generation-sequencing-and-machine-learning-used-to-map-genic-landscape-of-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Next- Generation-sequencing-and-machine-learning-used-to-map-genic-landscape-of-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bf73c11-3fa7-402f-a93b-fa3d1379040d Thu, 15 Feb 2024 23:19:30 -0500 Next-generation sequencing and machine learning used to map genetic landscape of pancreatic cancer
希望之城治愈了最年长的血癌患者并实现了艾滋病毒缓解City of Hope 是美国最大的癌症研究和治疗组织之一，治疗了最年长的血癌治愈者，并在接受来自具有罕见基因突变的捐赠者的血液干细胞移植后，艾滋病毒得到缓解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/City-of-Hope-cures-oldest-person-of-blood-cancer-and-achieves-HIV-remission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/City-of-Hope-cures-oldest-person-of-blood-cancer-and-achieves-HIV-remission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43b32476-aeca-43fa-bd41-eef9c438fbb0 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 22:55:00 -0500 City of Hope cures oldest person of blood cancer and achieves HIV remission
AI 通过“DeepGO-SE”彻底改变蛋白质功能预测研究人员开发了“DeepGO-SE”，这是一种通过序列预测蛋白质功能的新型人工智能方法，通过结合基因本体论和蛋白质-蛋白质相互作用，其性能显着优于传统模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/AI-revolutionizes- Protein-function-prediction-with-DeepGO-SE.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/AI-revolutionizes- Protein-function-prediction-with-DeepGO-SE.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=666269e9-53a9-4cc2-8b09-b62cef0eed48 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 22:20:00 -0500 AI revolutionizes protein function prediction with "DeepGO-SE"
调查报告显示，针对制药公司的投诉处理时间日益拖延英国医学杂志的一项调查发现，在近二十年的时间里，针对涉嫌违反行业行为准则的制药公司的投诉的处理时间增加了两倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Investigative-report-reveals-grinding-delays-in-complaint-processing-times-against-drug-companies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Investigative-report-reveals-grinding-delays-in-complaint-processing-times-against-drug-companies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fe6f501-ccdb-45c4-a9ef-cee66db3efe6 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 22:18:45 -0500 Investigative report reveals growing delays in complaint processing times against drug companies
发现短内含子的新剪接机制研究人员证实，教科书中出现的已建立的前 mRNA 剪接机制无法在人类短内含子的子集中起作用：已经发现了一种新颖的 SAP30BP-RBM17 复合物依赖性剪接。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Novel-splicing-mechanism-for-short-introns-discovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Novel-splicing-mechanism-for-short-introns-discovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4b7b63b-196b-4305-bc5e-8737295c918d Thu, 15 Feb 2024 22:13:18 -0500 Novel splicing mechanism for short introns discovered
纽约大学朗格尼分校奇迹手术拯救了患有罕见脑泡的男子艾弗·帕克 (Ivor Parker) 和凯伦·帕拉扎 (Karen Palaza) 已经在一起 20 年了，他们把每一天都当作情人节来对待。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Miracle-surgery-saves-man-with-rare-brain-bubble-at-NYU-Langone.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240215/Miracle-surgery-saves-man-with-rare-brain-bubble-at-NYU-Langone.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96808a5b-9aab-4dfd-866d-584f1541bd60 Thu, 15 Feb 2024 21:58:42 -0500 Miracle surgery saves man with rare brain bubble at NYU Langone
